channel.title: Testscape
channel.description:
well, got testscape working, and now im wondering how do i get it to use the no-ip.info? iv got a account and its already on my comp.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 10:40:55 PM[/size][hr]and my compile, it says javac is notnot recognized as a internal or external command.
Iv already done the system properties thing, i need to get the code for the compile edit. And i still need help with getting no-ip.info to work. Iv got it all downloaded, signed up and everything.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 11:55:51 PM[/size][hr]come on some one noes....

lmfao go into cmd then go right click compile and it will say something like JDK 6_07

replace the 6_“07” with the jdk update version that you have

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

http://img50.imageshack.us/my.php?image=untitled6xs.jpg

there is no run&compile, theres just a run, and a runeserver[br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 11:04:17 AM[/size][hr]it works now, ty[br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 12:31:20 PM[/size][hr]nothing i do saves, like players rights, i made me and 2 other people a admin, but it doesnt work. because of compile error still?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 12:52:09 PM[/size][hr]alright, this is how it should look right?

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cappy”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“i dont merch”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“orkee”))
{
playerRights = 3;[/code]

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @wcmasterjaap wcmasterjaap
item.description:
@wcmasterjaap wrote:

[quote=“mehaku, post:5, topic:4909”]@echo off COLOR 08 title Mescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause[/quote]
it also can maybe jre.1.5.0_06 or jdk1.5.0_07 or jdk1.5.0_06 thats depends on what java your have. i have jdk1 07 that one is very good and you dont got any error

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @DA_ew DÂ®ew
item.description:
@DA_ew wrote:

[quote=“mehaku, post:5, topic:4909”]… if you followed the tut right it works, also if you use compile alone it wont work you must use run&compile, and if you dont have that just copy this once you go into edit under compile:

@echo off COLOR 08 title Mescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause[/quote]
I fixed The Code one of the Backslashes was facing the wrong way

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

… if you followed the tut right it works, also if you use compile alone it wont work you must use run&compile, and if you dont have that just copy this once you go into edit under compile:

@echo off COLOR 08 title Mescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause

Read full topic
